meanings.definition: Relating to or involving different cultures.
meanings.sent1: The intercultural festival showcased traditions from various cultures.
meanings.sent2: Their intercultural marriage brought together customs from different backgrounds.
meanings.sent3: The intercultural potluck was a mix of flavors and spices from around the world.
meanings.sent4: The intercultural exchange program opened doors to new perspectives and experiences.
meanings.sent5: The intercultural art exhibit displayed a beautiful blend of artistic styles.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring between different cultures.
meanings.sent1: The intercultural communication workshop focused on bridging cultural differences.
meanings.sent2: The intercultural dialogue promoted understanding among diverse communities.
meanings.sent3: Their intercultural collaboration led to a unique and innovative project.
meanings.sent4: The intercultural trade agreements strengthened relationships between nations.
meanings.sent5: The intercultural music performance harmoniously combined melodies from various traditions.
